sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'; import Headline1 from './Typography/Headline1'; import Headline2 from './Typography/Headline2'; import Headline3 from './Typography/Headline3'; import Subtitle1 from './Typography/Subtitle1'; import Body1 from './Typography/Body1'; import Body2 from './Typography/Body2'; import Caption1 from './Typography/Caption1'; import Caption2 from './Typography/Caption2'; export default ({components, ...props}) => {`Typography`} {`Class101 UI의 Typography는 기기나 뷰포트 크기가 증가함에 따라 적절하게 확대되는 반응형, 모바일 우선 유동 글자 시스템을 지원합니다.`} {`Basic usage`} H1 heading H2 heading H3 heading H4 subtitle P and div body1 P and div body2 Div caption2 Div caption2`} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}> H1 heading H2 heading H3 heading H4 subtitle P and div body1 P and div body2 Div caption2 Div caption2 {`Responsive examples`} {`lg: >= 1024px `}
{` sm: < 2013px`} {`데스크탑(lg)과 모바일(sm)에서 태그와 스타일이 바뀝니다! 브라우저 창의 가로를 늘렸다 줄였다 해보세요!`} H1 heading or H2 heading H4 subtitle or P body1 paragraph DIV body1 or DIV body2 DIV caption1 or DIV caption2`} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}> H1 heading or H2 heading H4 subtitle or P body1 paragraph DIV body1 or DIV body2 DIV caption1 or DIV caption2 {`Headings`} H1 display2 H1 display3 H1 heading H2 heading H3 heading`} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}> H1 display2 H1 display3 H1 heading H2 heading H3 heading {`Subtitle`} H4 subtitle`} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}> H4 subtitle {`bodies`} Body1은 한 줄에 적합합니다. Body1Paragraph는 여러 줄에 적합합니다. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum. Body2는 한 줄에 적합합니다. Body2Paragraph는 여러 줄에 적합니다. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum. `} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}> Body1은 한 줄에 적합합니다.
